text:
Hello everyone, my name is Sylvain Estebe, I come from France, I was a music composer for 8 years before starting my studies in cognitive science. I’ve just finished my bachelor’s degree this year.
I’m interested in human and animal cognition, artificial intelligence and programming.

I’m currently in Norway for an internship studying the performance of a pianist using motion capture and eye-tracker.

I look forward to chatting with you.
